snippet: Sean Smith, an Air Force veteran working as an information management officer in Libya, was one of the four Americans killed in Tuesday’s attack on the diplomatic mission in Benghazi.

byline.original: By LESLIE KAUFMAN and CHRISTINE HAUSER

lead_paragraph: Sean Smith, an Air Force veteran working as an information management officer in Libya, was one of the four Americans killed in Tuesday’s attack on the diplomatic mission in Benghazi.

headline.main: Attack Victim Shared His Fears in Messages
